examples: At the end of the party, there were two reported breakages .

definitions.definition: A service which is unused by a customer, such as an unredeemed gift card , which therefore represents a pure profit to the seller.
The left-over money in a pari-mutuel betting pool resulting from rounding off the payoffs , added to the pool for the next race or event or kept as profit.

secondary_definitions: ( accounting ) A service which is unused by a customer, such as an unredeemed gift card , which therefore represents a pure profit to the seller.
The left-over money in a pari-mutuel betting pool resulting from rounding off the payoffs , added to the pool for the next race or event or kept as profit.
